title: University Convocation 2025 Announced
paragraph: The annual convocation ceremony will be held on March 20, celebrating the achievements of graduating students.

title: Computer Science Dept. Introduces AI Lab
paragraph: A fully equipped Artificial Intelligence research lab has been launched to support next-generation innovations.

title: Scholarship Applications Now Open
paragraph: Students can now apply for merit-based and need-based scholarships for the 2025 academic session.

title: New Library Building Completed
paragraph: The new central library is now open with over 50,000 books and modern digital resources.

title: Inter-University Sports Fest Begins
paragraph: Teams from 15 universities are participating in the annual sports festival hosted on the main campus.

title: Faculty Research Receives National Award
paragraph: Dr. Rahman from the Chemistry Department won the National Research Award for his outstanding contributions.

title: Admissions for Summer Semester Open
paragraph: Online applications for the upcoming summer semester are now being accepted.

title: Workshop on Web Development Completed
paragraph: Over 120 students participated in a hands-on workshop on modern web technologies.

title: Medical Center Extends Operating Hours
paragraph: The university medical center will now remain open until 10 PM to support student needs.

title: Science Fair 2025 Registration Started
paragraph: Students are invited to register for the upcoming university-level science exhibition.

title: New Bus Service Added for Students
paragraph: A new shuttle service has been added covering four additional routes for student convenience.

title: Language Club Organizes Debate Competition
paragraph: The English Language Club hosted an inter-departmental debate competition successfully.

title: Campus Wi-Fi Upgraded
paragraph: The IT department completed the Wi-Fi upgrade, providing faster internet across the campus.

title: Orientation Held for New Students
paragraph: The spring semester orientation event welcomed over 900 new students.

title: Entrepreneurship Summit Announced
paragraph: The annual startup and entrepreneurship summit will take place next month.

title: Campus Cleanup Drive Organized
paragraph: Environmental Club members participated in a campus-wide cleaning initiative.

title: Faculty Training Program Completed
paragraph: More than 40 faculty members attended a professional teaching development workshop.

title: ICT Building Renovation Begins
paragraph: Renovation work on the ICT building has started and will continue for the next three months.

title: Study Tour to Cox's Bazar Announced
paragraph: The Tourism & Hospitality department arranged an educational study tour for students.

title: Robotics Team Wins First Prize
paragraph: The university robotics club secured first place in a national competition.

title: Career Fair 2025 Scheduled
paragraph: More than 50 companies will participate in the annual career fair this April.

title: Online Exam Portal Updated
paragraph: A new update has been released for the online examination system to improve stability.

title: University Celebrates Independence Day
paragraph: The campus hosted cultural programs, discussions, and a flag-raising ceremony.

title: New Cafeteria Menu Introduced
paragraph: Healthy food options have been added to the cafeteria menu for students.

title: Mathematics Olympiad Registration Open
paragraph: Students from all departments can register for the upcoming math olympiad.

title: New Parking Area Inaugurated
paragraph: A new multi-level parking facility has been opened for students and staff.

title: Eco Club Plants 500 Trees
paragraph: An environmental initiative resulted in planting 500 new trees around the campus.

title: Midterm Exam Schedule Published
paragraph: The official midterm exam routine for all departments has been released.

title: Blood Donation Program Conducted
paragraph: A successful blood donation camp was organized in collaboration with a local hospital.

title: Cultural Festival 2025 Announced
paragraph: Students are preparing for the upcoming annual cultural festival.

title: IT Club Releases New Mobile App
paragraph: A student-developed campus helper app has been launched for Android users.

title: Exchange Program Applications Open
paragraph: Students can now apply for international exchange programs in Europe and Asia.

title: New Physics Laboratory Equipment Installed
paragraph: Advanced lab equipment has been added to enhance practical learning.

title: Counseling Center Increases Staff
paragraph: Three new counselors have joined to support student mental health services.

title: Training on Cybersecurity Conducted
paragraph: A workshop on cybersecurity awareness was attended by 200+ students.

title: Hostel Allotment Results Published
paragraph: The hostel accommodation list for new students has been published online.

title: Photography Club Exhibition Held
paragraph: The annual photo exhibition showcased creative works from students.

title: Green Campus Initiative Launched
paragraph: A new sustainability program aims to reduce plastic use across campus.

title: Alumni Meet 2025 Announced
paragraph: The annual alumni gathering will be organized on December 5.

title: Electrical Dept. Hosts Tech Talk
paragraph: An expert from industry presented a session on renewable energy solutions.

title: New Cricket Ground Opened
paragraph: The newly renovated cricket field is now ready for training and matches.

title: Female Dormitory Security Enhanced
paragraph: New CCTV cameras and security staff have been deployed for safety.

title: Annual Book Fair Starts Today
paragraph: The book fair includes new publications and special student discounts.

title: Students Participate in International Hackathon
paragraph: A team of 5 students represented the university in a global coding event.

title: Campus Security Guidelines Updated
paragraph: All students must carry ID cards inside the campus following new policies.

title: New Research Collaboration Signed
paragraph: The university partnered with a global organization to enhance joint research.

title: Debate Team Wins Regional Championship
paragraph: The university debate team secured the championship title in a regional contest.

title: NCC Training Camp Completed
paragraph: NCC cadets successfully completed a 7-day intensive training program.

title: New Online Course Platform Released
paragraph: Students can now access recorded lectures and study materials online.

title: University Celebrates Annual Foundation Day
paragraph: The institution marked its founding anniversary with cultural programs and speeches.
